name: TimePal-TimeConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask Time Pal what's the time in New York”
”Alexa, ask Time Pal what time is it in Seattle”
”Alexa, ask Time Pal what's the time in Alabama”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time pal
des: Need to know the timezone, or time, in a different city? Maybe you're scheduling a meeting with colleagues from around the world and need to find a suitable time. Using this skill, simply ask Alexa what the time is in a city, country or location and it will tell you the timezone and current time (and date!) in that location.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
